headline: Xfinity Unveils New Membership Experience Packed With Exclusive Perks and Surprises
summary: PHILADELPHIA, January 21, 2026--Comcast’s Xfinity today announced the launch of Xfinity Membership, a new loyalty experience that brings customers’ favorite rewards together with even more benefits, including epic experiences, everyday perks and special discounts. Designed to make the benefits easier to access and more rewarding than ever, Xfinity Membership includes automatic status, at no additional cost and with no enrollment required.

headline: Comcast Corp. Cl A stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day
summary: Comcast Corp. Cl A stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day

headline: New Xfinity Store Opens in South DeKalb
summary: ATLANTA, January 21, 2026--Comcast is celebrating the grand opening of its new Xfinity Store in South DeKalb, located at 3910 Flat Shoals Parkway.

headline: Comcast (CMCSA) Valuation Check As Universal Ads Taps David Shaw For Global Expansion
summary: Comcast (CMCSA) has put its advertising arm back in focus after Universal Ads hired David Shaw to lead global expansion, with the UK identified as the next key market following US progress. See our latest analysis for Comcast. Despite Comcast’s push to grow Universal Ads and expand its Xfinity footprint, the share price is at US$28.16, with a 30 day share price return showing a 4.77% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return showing a 15.35% decline, suggesting momentum has been fading...
